hero.title: Kuvaka Kwakanaka muCape Town
hero.subtitle: Neruzivo rwemakore anopfuura gumi namana, tinogadzira hwaro hwakasimba, hwakaoma uye hunoyevedza hwekuvakira kwenyu mukati nekunze. Kubva pakuvaka nezvitina kusvika pakudzivirira mvura, tinogona zvese zvekuvaka zvenyu.

about.title: Ongororo yeBhizinesi
about.description: Kanguya builders yakatanga sevashandi vekuvaka muna 2010 muCape Town, South Africa, vachiita mapurojekiti madiki ekuvaka muCape Town. Kubva 2010-2018, Kanguya builders yaizivikanwa seTrust Builders. Pakupera kwa2018, Kanguya builders yakatamira kuZambia uko takaitawo mapurojekiti akawanda ekuvaka uye tikachinja zita redu kuita Kanguya Builders muZunguru reLusaka kusvika muna 2021. Muna 2022, takadzokera kuCape Town, South Africa uko takazvisimbisa zvakazara sevatambi vane simba muindasitiri yekuvaka, tichiita mapurojekiti madiki nemepakati, tichiita basa rekutonga mapurojekiti, tichipa masevhisi akanaka, uye tichipa mhinduro dzeinjiniya yekutengesa kune vatengi vedu.
about.visionText: Kuva vavaki vanokudzwa uye kuendesa zvinopfuura zvatinotarisira nguva dzese uye kubatsira kuhurongwa hwekuvandudza nharembozha dzeAfrica uye kutora chikamu mukugadzira mabasa kuvechidiki veAfrica.

philosophyPoints.safety: Kuve nechokwadi chekuchengeteka nenharaunda yakafanira yebasa panzvimbo nguva dzese
philosophyPoints.planning: Kugadzira purogiramu yakadzama nehurongwa hwezvinodiwa kuti tikwanise zvinangwa zvevatengi vedu
philosophyPoints.communication: Kutaurirana mazuva ese nevese vanobatanidzwa mupurojekiti

services.title: Masevhisi Edu Ekuvaka
services.subtitle: Mhinduro dzakakwana dzekuvaka nekugadziridza nemakore e14+ eruzivo
services.tilingDesc: Kuisa matayili kwehunyanzvi papasi, pamadziro, uye kumashure
services.plasteringDesc: Masevhisi ehunyanzvi ekupaka dhaka pamadziro emukati nekunze
services.brickworkDesc: Kuvaka zvitina zvemhando pamusoro zvekuvaka uye zvishongedzwa
services.paintingDesc: Masevhisi ekupenda mukati nekunze nemhinduro dzepamusoro
services.pavingDesc: Kurongedza migwagwa yemotokari neyekufamba nezvinhu zvakaoma
services.carpentryDesc: Zvinhu zvakaumbwa zvezvematanda nemhinduro dzebasa rematanda

projects.title: Mapurojekiti Edu Akakosha
projects.subtitle: Kuzvipira kwedu kuhunyanzvi, kutarira kune zvakadzama, uye kuzvipira kwedu kusingashandi kuona kuti vatengi vagutsikana zvinotisiyanisa sechisarudzo chekutanga chezvese zvinodaidzwa zvekuvaka nekugadziridza.

costEstimator.title: Chiridzwa Chekuyera Mutengo
costEstimator.subtitle: Tora kufungidzira kwakafupi kwepurojekiti yako yekuvaka. Isa zvakadzama zvepurojekiti yako pazasi kuti ugamuchire mutengo unofungidzirwa zvinoenderana nemitengo yedu yazvino.
costEstimator.projectDetailsDesc: Ipa ruzivo rwepurojekiti yako kwekuyera mutengo
costEstimator.standard: Zvepakati - Zvinhu zvakanaka uye kuoma kwepakati
costEstimator.premium: Zvepamusoro - Zvinhu zvepamusoro uye kugadzira kwakaoma
costEstimator.estimateDesc: Chiyero chedu chemutengo chinopa kufungidzira kwakafupi zvinoenderana ne:
costEstimator.importantNote: Chakakosha: Ichi chiri kufungidzira kwakafupi. Mitengo yekupedzisira inogona kusiyana zvinoenderana nezvinodiwa chaizvo, mamiriro enzvimbo, kusarudza zvinhu, nemitengo yazvino yemusika. Batana nesu kuti uwane mutengo wakadzama.
costEstimator.contactDesc: Batana nesu kuti uwane mutengo wakadzama nekubvunzurudza kwehunyanzvi

gallery.title: Garidzira rePurojekiti
gallery.subtitle: Ongorora portfolio yedu yemapurojekiti akapera. Ona hunhu hwehunyanzvi uye kutarira kune zvakadzama zvinosiyanisa Kanguya Builders.

cta.title: Wakagadzirira Kutanga Purojekiti Yako?
cta.subtitle: Rega tikugadzirire chimwe chinhu chinoshamisa zvakare. Taurirana nesu kuti uwane kubvunzurudza kwemahara nemutengo.

reviews.title: Ongororo dzeVatengi neUchapupu
reviews.subtitle: Verenga ongororo dzechokwadi dzevatengi vedu nezve ruzivo rwavo neKanguya Builders. Mhinduro dzako dzinotibatyira kuchengetedza zviyero zvedu zvepamusoro uye kunobatsira vamwe kuita sarudzo dzine ruzivo.

authentic.title: Ongororo Dzechokwadi dzeVatengi
authentic.description: Ongororo yega yega inobva kuvatengi vechokwadi vaka shandisa masevhisi edu ekuvaka vega.

contact.title: Batana Nesu
contact.subtitle: Taura nesu kuti uwane zvaunoda zvekuvaka nekugadziridza
contact.name: Zita Rizere
contact.subject: Musoro

quote.title: Tora Mutengo Wako Wemahara Nhasi
quote.subtitle: Wakagadzirira kutanga purojekiti yako yekuvaka kana kugadziridza? Tora mutengo wakagadzirirwa unokwanira zvamunouda.

footer.description: Mauya kuKanguya Builders, chanangwa chako chakavimbika chemasevhisi ekuvaka nekugadziridza emhando yepamusoro. Nemakore anopfuura gumi namana muindasitiri yekuvaka, tinodada zvikuru nekupa mhinduro dzisina chakanaka.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Kanguya Builders. Kodzero dzese dzakachengetedzwa. | Masevhisi Ehunyanzvi Ekuvaka Nekugadziridza

reviewForm.title: Govera Ruzivo Rwako
reviewForm.description: Batsira vamwe uchigovera ruzivo rwako neKanguya Builders. Mhinduro dzako dzechokwadi dzakakosha kwatiri nevatengi vemangwana.

success.title: Tinotenda Ongororo Yako!
success.message: Ongororo yako yatumirwa uye ichabudiswa mushure mekuyera kwedu. Tinokoshesa mhinduro dzako uye dzinobatsira vamwe vatengi kuita sarudzo dzine ruzivo.

form.reviewPlaceholder: Govera zvakadzama nezve ruzivo rwako neKanguya Builders. Ndeipiko sevhisi yawakashandisa? Huwandu, nguva, nesevhisi yevatengi zvakanga zvakaita sei?
form.recommendQuestion: Ungakurudzira Kanguya Builders kune vamwe here? *
